## numberToString() function

Coerces a number into a string.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function numberToString(value: unknown): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | unknown | A number to convert to string  {<!-- -->string<!-- -->} The value after coercing the given value to a string. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string
